originalText.text: I don’t make a habit of complaining at review sites and normally would leave pretty positive reviews, but I’ll make an exception for BA cleaning services and do extend a fair warning here. I asked for a moving out cleaning service, including outside and inside window cleaning and I was assured by them that they could provide this specific service. They weren’t the cheapest, but I trusted them as their initial communications were good. However, the were unable to do the window cleaning and I was left with dirty windows and no time left to make other arrangements. They also did not bring al the utensils for moving out service, notwithstanding the fact that  I clearly said that the house would be empty. When I communicated to Beverly, the operations manager, she promised me to come back at this issue. I waited a full day, and send two follow-up messages, but nothing happened. The crew was nice and did their best, but the results are far below expectations especially noting that I paid over $300 for a six hours basic job.Don’t ask for their services if you need a more complex job done.

originalText.text: I hired BA Cleaning Service to clean my home for Mother's Day.  They even did the windows as I requested and my kitchen and bathroom look brand new.  My home looks and feels so clean. I even took advantage of the Mother's Day Special they offered. It is a great deal for the service you get. I strongly recommend BA Cleaning Service.

I even took advantage of the Mother's Day Special they offered. It is a great deal for the service you get. I strongly recommend BA Cleaning Service.

originalText.text:
Great customer service. I had a great experience working with the team at BA Cleaning Service. Fantastic customer service and response rate. They were able to book my cleaning service sooner than later and managed to make scheduling changes when needed.

I booked a 'deep clean' and they made my place shine.

text.text:

I booked a 'deep clean' and they made my place shine.

originalText.text:
I engaged someone from this agency recently to clean and help in the kitchen. The results were extremely disappointing in all respects. The worker did little else but dishes, putting the food away and very minimal cleaning
She did not know even the very basics.I was forced to work the entire evening doing most of the work myself while tending to my guests. She even overcharged me. The whole thing was truly unbelievable. I left a message with the agency shortly thereafter.. The call was never returned. The episode was truly astonishing. I would never use this agency again. Period.

originalText.text: We get our apartment cleaned every two weeks. The service is impeccable and Beverly always makes sure that we remember when the next visit is due. She is very flexible and responsive. We highly recommend.
